11.13 全球黑衣日Global Wear Black for Hong Kong Day

我們的活動Event Page:

https://www.facebook.com/events/423945924960745/

召換海外所有巴絲打！！！！

DC4HK同HKDC正向所有海外的香港人呼籲明天 (11月13日)在你們的本地時間一同穿起黑衣以顯示我們的團結心，並支持一直以來為香港的民主和自由所奮鬥，和悼念在這場抗爭中失去生命的香港人。超過二十間海外的香港人組織亦已響應明天11.13 全球黑衣日的活動。以下是我們活動的簡介：



香港已進入緊急狀態：

自六月開始這五個多月來的示威活動以來，香港的警暴從未減退。數千香港市民已被濫捕、被虐打、被侵犯。除了催淚彈、橡膠子彈外，香港警察已使用了實彈射向示威者。而被警暴所侵害的很多都只是僅僅穿著黑衣的普通市民。

在11月11日（星期一），有警員向兩名手無寸鐵的示威者發射了實彈。在同一日早上，香港警察以非法集會之名攻佔多間大學並濫捕大學生。在11月12日（星期二），香港警察部署了載有藍色不明化學物的水炮車、催淚彈以及橡膠子彈進攻香港中文大學，以致多名大學生受傷。

我們正呼籲所有海外的香港人於11月13日（星期三）一同穿起黑衣以顯示我們的團結心，並支持一直以來為香港的民主和自由所奮鬥，和悼念在這場抗爭中失去生命的香港人。我們歡迎你們把當天黑色的衣著的照片Hashtag標籤 #HKwearsblack上載給我們，以及邀請你們朋友一同參與。


HONG KONG IS IN EMERGENCY:

Five months have passed since the beginning of the protests in Hong Kong, and police brutality has never quieted down. Thousands of Hong Kongers have been arrested, assaulted, tear-gassed and even shot with live-rounds simply for wearing black in public, or for arbitrarily judged as associated with protestors dressed in black.

Just this Monday (11/11), a police officer pointed his gun at an unarmed protestor who showed no signs of aggression, and then shot live round at two other unarmed protestors. In the same morning, the police force has also marched into universities on the ridiculous ground that students are illegally assembling on campus. On Tuesday (11/12), the Hong Kong police stormed into Chinese University of Hong Kong and deployed tear gas canisters, water cannon (with blue-dyed water containing strong chemical irritants) and rubber bullets within the school's perimeters, severely injuring many university students.

Join us on 11/13 your local time and wear black to stand in solidarity with Hong Kongers - for the souls lost, and for those of us who are still fighting for freedom and
democracy. Use the hashtag #HKwearsblack, upload pictures of you wearing black, and tag your friends to join.
